posts.post_title: FS: T206 Sweet Caporal Jack Knight Portrait PSA 8 OC
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a very nice PSA 8 0C Jack Knight Portrait. Sharp card with a little bit of a diamond cut. $400 delivered and insured. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers. 

$400 Delivered
